Name: الرقة
loc: Early Islamic al-Raqqa; plan of al-Raqqa in EI2, "Rakka" (M. Meinecke).
Comments: No ʿAbbāsid coinage after 254 H; first gold issue from 279 H (Ṭūlūnid) (Diler, vol. I).

Name: الموصل
Comments: Almost only copper in Umayyad period; gold intermittently from 263 H(Diler, vol. II); silver only in 82-83 (Album, 41).

Name: بلد
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
Comments: No gold (Diler, vol. I); 263 H from Album, 49.

Name: حران
id: Ancient Carrhae; historical site is mostly in ruins today.
Comments: Gold only under Ṭūlūnids and later ʿAbbāsids (Diler, vol. I); silver in 80, 82, 87-89 (Album, 40).

Name: رأس العين
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
Comments: Gold old in 290 H (Diler, vol. I).

Name: رحبة ملك إبن طوق
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
id: Corresponds roughly to modern al-Mayadin (EI2, Honigmann)
loc: Modern town of al-Mayādīn, identified by Bianquis ("Reflexion… Rahba-Mayadin") as the site of Rahbat Malik.
Comments: No copper; no gold after 295 H (Diler, vol. I)

Name: قرقيسية
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
Comments: ʿUqaylid coins, gold and silver (Diler, vol. II).

Name: ماردين
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
Comments: One issue (gold) in 312 H (Diler, vol. II)

Name: نصيبين
location_certainty: no specific clues for an exact location
Comments: Silver from 251 H; gold from 263 H (Diler, vol. II).
